{"id":939952658,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"4 months, 4 weeks","timestamp":1682497264,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/939952658/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Add Digits","memory":"6 MB","code":"class Solution {\nprivate:\n    int addSum(int n) {\n        int newNum;\n        int sum = 0;\n        while(n) {\n            newNum = n % 10;\n            sum += newNum;\n            n /= 10;\n        }\n        return sum;\n    }\npublic:\n    int addDigits(int num) {\n        int newSum = addSum(num);\n        while(!((newSum / 10) < 1)) {\n            newSum = addSum(newSum);\n        }\n        return newSum;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"add-digits","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
